transcript: him to thee, could take him by the hand and show him to thee. But how can I, an insig- nificant mortal, show His omnipotence, His in- finity, and all His mercy to one who is blind, or who shuts his eyes that he may not see or understand Him and may not see or under- stand his own vileness and sinfulness?" He paused again. "Who art thou? Thou dreamest that thou art wise because thou couldst utter those blasphemous words," he went on, with a somber and scornful smile. "And thou art more foolish
